metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11065 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Gradle versions from 1.4 to 5.3.1 use an insecure HTTP URL to download dependencies when the built-in JavaScript or CoffeeScript Gradle plugins are used. Dependency artifacts could have been maliciously compromised by a MITM attack against the ajax.googleapis.com web site.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-11065` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gradle - 4.4.1-10
libgradle-core-java - 4.4.1-10
libgradle-plugins-java - 4.4.1-10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gradle package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-10').
